planner codes item site details for Item Sites by Planner Code
section.para: To view Item Sites by Planner Code, select the "Item Sites by Planner Code" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying Item Sites by Planner Code, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display Item Sites for all Planner Codes.
Specify Planner Code whose Item Sites you want to display.
Enter a Planner Code pattern to select a range of Planner Codes. Refine your search using Regular Expressions.
Select to display Item Sites by Planner Code for all Sites.
Specify Site whose Item Sites by Planner Code you want to display.
Select to display active as well as inactive Item Sites.
Display lists Item Sites by Planner Code, using the specified parameters.
